game.name: Ramen Shop Simulator
game.shortDescription: Take control of your very own Ramen Shop! Transform a cozy, worn-out Japanese alley back into a vibrant hotspot. From scrubbing floors to cooking the perfect bowl of ramen. Decorate every corner, upgrade everything, and create your unique restaurant.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take control of your very own Ramen Shop! Transform a cozy, worn-out Japanese alley back into a vibrant hotspot. From scrubbing floors to cooking the perfect bowl of ramen. Decorate every corner, upgrade everything, and create your unique restaurant.
